thread.title: BRIEF-Euro Yatirim Holding To Fully Acquire Sampi Gida At 55.0 Mln Lira From Avrasya Terminal Isletmeleri

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Euro Yatirim Holding To Fully Acquire Sampi Gida At 55.0 Mln Lira From Avrasya Terminal Isletmeleri

organizations.name: brief-euro yatirim holding to fully acquire sampi gida

text:
March 9 (Reuters) - EURO YATIRIM HOLDING:
* DECIDES TO FULLY ACQUIRE TOTAL OF 11 MILLION LIRA NOMINAL SHARES IN SAMPI GIDA WORTH 55.0 MILLION LIRA FROM AVRASYA TERMINAL ISLETMELERI
